title: Cognitive Engagement Recommendations
summary: As a caregiver, I want to receive suggestions for cognitive activities that align with the older adult's interests and performance, so that I can encourage meaningful engagement and monitor their cognitive health.

title: Physical Activity Monitoring
summary: As a caregiver, I want to track the physical activity levels of older adults so that I can encourage increased mobility and exercise for their health and well-being.

title: Personalized Activity Suggestions for Patient Engagement
summary: As a caregiver, I want ALFRED to recommend physical activities based on my patients' abilities and preferences so that I can promote suitable options for engagement and monitor their well-being effectively.

title: Progress Monitoring for Activities
summary: As a caregiver, I want to monitor the progress and participation of older adults in cognitive and physical activities so that I can provide tailored support and ensure their engagement.

title: Activity Effectiveness Feedback
summary: As a caregiver, I want users to easily provide feedback on activities so that I can adjust future recommendations to better meet their needs and preferences.

title: Guided Exercise Routines for Safe Care
summary: As a caregiver, I want to initiate guided exercise routines for older adults so that their physical activities are safe and tailored to their capabilities.
